message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll match your fairness, but I think I deserve a bit more for my negotiation skills.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to live comfortably in my golden years.
I'm trying to be generous, Bob. This is my best offer so far.
I'm not budging, Alice. You'll have to do better than that if you want to get a bigger share.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. Let's call it a draw.
I'm starting to get impatient, Alice. I think it's time for you to give me the majority of the cash.
I'm trying to be reasonable, Bob. This is my last generous offer.
I'm not getting any younger, and I need the cash. Take it or leave it, Alice.
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob. I'll give you most of it, but I want something.
I'm not leaving with less than 99. It's now or never, Alice.
